full_summary:
================================

### Announcement of Request for Proposal

**Title:** Confined Spaces Rescue Equipment
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-17T14:00:00

### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified vendors to submit proposals for the provision of confined space rescue equipment. The successful vendor will be required to deliver equipment that meets the amended Canada Occupational Health and Safety (COHS) Regulation Part XI, Confined Space Entry Regulation, and ensures the safety of ship staff and FMF/contractor personnel conducting maintenance activities.

**Key Selection Criteria**

* Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**

* Halifax

**Contracting Entity and Shipping**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Shipping Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Shipping Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**

* Furlong, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not provided

### Important Dates

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-17T14:00:00
* Expected Contract End Date: Not provided

### Notice URL

* English: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16701766?extsite=MTY3MDE3NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16701766?extsite=MTY3MDE3NjZfQU4wMTQ4N
